title: Master Forex & Crypto Trading - From Basics to Funded Trader
author: TheTradingGurukul Team
topics: Introduction to Forex and Crypto markets
How to qualify for funded accounts
description: Join India’s premier trading education platform and master Forex & Crypto trading. Get access to real $10,000 funded accounts after completing the course and passing evaluations. This course includes full mentorship, live sessions, strategy building, and risk management techniques designed to make you a confident, funded trader.
